Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Sgt. Bethany Kidd to receive certain service credit under a twenty year retirement plan
Summary: Authorizes Sgt. Bethany Kidd to receive certain service credit under a twenty year retirement plan for service with the Seneca Falls Police Department.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Sgt. Bethany Kidd to receive certain service credit under a twenty year retirement plan
